title: A sustainable methodology employing the extract of red dragon fruit peel as a fluorescence probe for detection of indigo carmine (E132) in food samples: evaluation of the method's greenness, whiteness, and blueness

Utilizing the extract of red dragon fruit peel for the development of a sustainable and green spectrofluorimetric method for the detection of indigo carmine in food samples based on the inner filter effect.
